Articles.Content:
This in the first weekly challenge I have ever made (also the first challenge I ever made), so I figured the first one should be simple. And what is more simple then a Mun landing! 

OBJECTIVE- Make a voyage to the Mun and back. 

RULES- Must be manned, with at least 1 kerbal + Must be completely stock parts + Absoloutley no cheating (HyperEdit, debug menu, ect.) + MechJeb allowed, but see Bonuses section + Visual enhancement mods allowed + no mods purposed for exploiting physics 

You must post a picture album or record a video for proof of your accomplishment.

Any mod not mentioned is not allowed. Be creative, and try some of the bonuses!

BONUSES- Apollo style (command and lander module)= 1 extra point

Land with a rover= 2 extra points

Land next to Easter egg (Armstrong monolith for example)= 5 extra points

Land next to green monolith= 20 extra points

Do trip without maneuver nodes= 6 extra points

Do trip without Mechjeb= 1 extra points

Do trip without leaving debris= 10 extra points

NOTES- I donor know when I will judge the entries, it depends on how popular the challenge becomes. I will post the date as soon as I decide, but for now, YOU can make this challenge series more popular by giving this thread a good rating! Have a fun and safe Mun voyage!

Edited April 28, 2019 by DRAG0Nmon
Forgotten detail for challenge (album/video rule)
